tool_description: An API showing the latest War news from greek newspapers
name: WAR NEWS API (GREEK NEWSPAPERS)
title: WAR NEWS API (GREEK NEWSPAPERS)

api_list.name: Get all war news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back news about war from greek newspapers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://war-news-api-greek-newspapers.p.rapidapi.com/war-news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "war-news-api-greek-newspapers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://war-news-api-greek-newspapers.p.rapidapi.com/war-news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "war-news-api-greek-newspapers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
